Package com.cmput301f20t14.bookbox.activities

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddBookActivity
    This activity handles the book addition functionality.
    EditBookActivity
    This activity handles the edit book feature of BookBox It allows the user to add a picture to the book, edit the title, author and the isbn and also allows the user to delete the book.
    HandOverActivity
    This activity allows the user hand over a book to an owner/borrower, depending on whether the transaction is a borrowing or a return.
    HomeActivity
    This shows the Home Menu with a task bar at the bottom The Home Menu shows the users owned books By navigating the task bar, the user can: - View their profile - View their notifications - View their Library (Home Menu) - View a menu where they can choose to view requests & borrowed books
    ListsActivity
    This activity allows the user to interact with three lists: Requested Books, Accepted books that he/she has requested and Borrowed books.
    LocationActivity
    This activity allows the user to set/view the location where the book will be received or borrowed
    MainActivity
    This is the initial activity that shows a login screen and allows for user registration (RegisterUserActivity).
    NotificationsActivity
    This is the activity where the user can view their notifications that they receive.
    ProfileActivity
    Here is where the user can view their own profile.
    ReceiveActivity
    This activity allows the user to confirm the receival of a book during a return or a borrowing.
    RegisterUserActivity
    This the activity allowing a user to register an account for the app.
    ScanningActivity
    This is the scanning activity.
    SearchActivity
    This activity handles the searching feature of the app.
    UserSearchActivity
    This activity allows the user to search for other users and view their profiles
    ViewBookRequestsActivity
    This activity allows the user to view requests on one of his or her book.
